protocol.description: This protocol allows a privileged client to grab keyboard keys.

interface.name: tdesktopenvironment_keygrab_manager_v1
interface.description: This interface is a manager that allows key grabs.

enum.name: activation_type
enum.description: These values indicate which action triggered the activate event.

enum.name: modifier
enum.description: These values indicate modifier keys that can be grabbed

request.name: ungrab_key
request.description: Releases the grab on a key.

event.name: activated
event.description: The event tells the client that the key has been pressed.

arg.name: mod
arg.summary: evdev keyboard modifiers for the active grab

arg.name: key
arg.summary: evdev keycode for the active grab

arg.name: type
arg.summary: evdev keycode for the active grab

request.name: destroy
request.description: All keygrabs will no longer be reported.
